filmography.title: Great Expectations
filmography.role_description: The cruel, beautiful young girl raised by Miss Havisham to break men's hearts, who captivates the young Pip.
filmography.plot: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

filmography.title: Black Narcissus
filmography.role_description: A silent, seductive local girl in the Himalayas who tempts the Young General, disrupting the order of the convent.
filmography.plot: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

filmography.title: Hamlet
filmography.role_description: The tragic daughter of Polonius whose descent into madness and death earned Simmons her first Oscar nomination.
filmography.plot: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former King.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress; Venice Film Festival: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: The Blue Lagoon
filmography.role_description: A girl shipwrecked on a tropical island who grows up and falls in love with her fellow castaway.
filmography.plot: Two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island and grow up together, eventually falling in love and surviving the elements.

filmography.title: So Long at the Fair
filmography.role_description: A young woman visiting the Paris Exhibition whose brother mysteriously vanishes, and everyone claims he never existed.
filmography.plot: A woman's brother disappears during the 1889 Paris Exhibition, but no one believes he was ever there.

filmography.title: Angel Face
filmography.role_description: A mentally unstable heiress who becomes obsessed with an ambulance driver and manipulates him into a murder plot.
filmography.plot: A beautiful but dangerous heiress manipulates her chauffeur into a plot to murder her stepmother.

filmography.title: Young Bess
filmography.role_description: The future Queen Elizabeth I, portrayed during her tumultuous youth and dangerous path to the throne.
filmography.plot: The story of the early life of Elizabeth I, from her childhood to her ascension to the throne of England.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: The Robe
filmography.role_description: A noblewoman and childhood friend of Marcellus Gallio who remains loyal to him despite his conversion to Christianity.
filmography.plot: In the Roman province of Judea, a Roman tribune commands the unit that crucifies Jesus, but he is forever changed by the experience.

filmography.title: The Actress
filmography.role_description: A determined teenager in the early 20th century who defies her father's wishes to pursue a career on the stage.
filmography.plot: A young woman is determined to become an actress, much to the dismay of her father who wants her to attend college.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: The Egyptian
filmography.role_description: A humble tavern maid who becomes a follower of the new monotheistic religion and the love interest of the protagonist.
filmography.plot: In ancient Egypt, a poor orphan becomes a brilliant physician and travels the known world.

filmography.title: Désirée
filmography.role_description: The first love of Napoleon Bonaparte who eventually becomes the Queen of Sweden.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between Napoleon Bonaparte and Désirée Clary, the girl who would eventually become Queen of Sweden.

filmography.title: Guys and Dolls
filmography.role_description: A stiff Salvation Army sergeant who lets her hair down in Havana after falling for gambler Sky Masterson.
filmography.plot: A gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive.

filmography.title: Hilda Crane
filmography.role_description: A twice-divorced woman who returns to her conservative college town and struggles with societal expectations.
filmography.plot: A divorced woman returns to her hometown and tries to rebuild her life, facing judgment and romantic complications.

filmography.title: This Could Be the Night
filmography.role_description: A prim schoolteacher who takes a job as a secretary at a nightclub run by a tough gangster.
filmography.plot: A schoolteacher gets a job at a nightclub and tries to reform the gangsters and strippers who work there.

filmography.title: Until They Sail
filmography.role_description: A New Zealand woman who falls in love with a weary American Marine officer during World War II.
filmography.plot: Four sisters in New Zealand struggle with life and love during World War II when American soldiers arrive.

filmography.title: The Big Country
filmography.role_description: A ranch owner and schoolteacher who holds the key to a water war between two feuding families.
filmography.plot: A New Englander arrives in the Old West, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

filmography.title: Home Before Dark
filmography.role_description: A woman released from a mental institution who struggles to readjust to life with her distant husband and critical step-family.
filmography.plot: A woman returns home after a stay in a mental hospital, but her husband and step-sister may be driving her back to the brink.

filmography.title: Elmer Gantry
filmography.role_description: A charismatic revivalist preacher who falls for a smooth-talking con man, leading to a tragic end.
filmography.plot: A fast-talking traveling salesman joins a female evangelist's road show and becomes a powerful religious figure, but his past secrets threaten his success.

filmography.title: Spartacus
filmography.role_description: A slave woman who becomes the wife of Spartacus and a symbol of hope and endurance during the rebellion.
filmography.plot: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

filmography.title: The Grass Is Greener
filmography.role_description: A quirky, fashion-conscious friend who gets caught in the middle of a marital farce between an Earl and his wife.
filmography.plot: A British Earl fights to save his marriage after an American millionaire falls for his wife.

filmography.title: All the Way Home
filmography.role_description: A pregnant mother who must help her family cope with the sudden death of her husband.
filmography.plot: A death in the family forces a young boy and his mother to cope with their loss in 1915 Tennessee.

filmography.title: Divorce American Style
filmography.role_description: A bitter divorcée who tries to warn a newly separated woman about the perils of life after marriage.
filmography.plot: After 17 years of marriage, a couple divorces and finds that the single life isn't what they expected.

filmography.title: The Happy Ending
filmography.role_description: A middle-aged woman who questions her marriage and turns to alcohol before embarking on a journey of self-discovery.
filmography.plot: A disillusioned wife and mother leaves her husband on their anniversary to find herself.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Drama)

filmography.title: The Thorn Birds
filmography.role_description: The stoic, hardened matriarch of the Cleary family who hides a secret past and endures a lifetime of hardship.
filmography.plot: A Catholic priest is torn between his calling and his love for a young woman in the Australian outback.
filmography.awards: Emmy Award: Win – Outstanding Supporting Actress

filmography.title: How to Make an American Quilt
filmography.role_description: An elderly woman who shares her life story and quilting wisdom with a young woman contemplating marriage.
filmography.plot: A bride-to-be visits her grandmother and great-aunt, where she learns about love and life from their quilting circle.

filmography.title: Howl's Moving Castle
filmography.role_description: The English voice of the elderly Sophie, a young woman cursed to live in an old body; Simmons' final major film role.
filmography.plot: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.
